quotes.quote: Without Jerusalem, the land of Israel is as a body without a soul.
The view of Jerusalem is the history of the world; it is more, it is the history of earth and of heaven.
Jerusalem is a port city on the shore of eternity.
Jerusalem the golden, with milk and honey blessed, beneath thy contemplation sink heart and voice oppressed.
Ten measures of beauty descended to the world, nine were taken by Jerusalem and one by the rest of the world. Jerusalem is a beauty unparalleled.
One doesn't go to Jerusalem, one returns to it. That's one of its mysteries.
When a Jew visits Jerusalem for the first time, it is not the first time; it is homecoming.
In the din and tumult of the age, the still small voice of Jerusalem remains our only music.
You ought to let the Jews have Jerusalem; it was they who made it famous.
Jerusalem is old, Jerusalem is new, Jerusalem can hold Muslim, Christian, Jew.
Jerusalem doesn't belong only to Israelis and Palestinians, Muslims and Jews, but to the world.
Jerusalem will always be the capital of Israel, even if someday a peace agreement were to be reached.
Jerusalem is holy to three religions. You have to respect that.
Jerusalem is a festival and a lamentation. Its song is a sigh across the ages, a delicate, robust, mournful psalm at the great junction of spiritual cultures.
Jerusalem will remain the capital of Israel, and it must remain undivided.
Whoever did not see Jerusalem in its days of glory, never saw a beautiful city in their life.
Jerusalem itself, understand what power is, understand what glory is, understand at all.
No city in the world, not even Athens or Rome, ever played as great a role in the life of a nation for so long a time, as Jerusalem has done in the life of the Jewish people.
In the din and tumult of the age, the still small voice of Jerusalem remains our only music.
Jerusalem is united, will never be divided again.
Jerusalem should not tolerate any religious war.
The capital of Israel is Jerusalem, no matter what.
Eternity this refers to Jerusalem.
